en: So use it wisely and don't waste it.
zh: 所以要明智地使用它，不要浪费。

en: Don't waste your breath.
zh: 别白费口舌了。

en: Don't waste your money.

en: We are working hard to make up for lost time.
zh: 我们正在努力弥补失去的时间。

en: We're working hard to make up for lost time.
zh: 我们正在努力弥补失去的时间。

en: It is difficult to make up for wasted time.

en: Why don't you make up for the lost time?

en: All you need to do is get back the time you have wasted.

en: You must make up for lost time.

en: I do not want to exert myself in vain.

en: It's useless to try and resist.

en: It seems appropriate to apply these rules to the voiceless consonants.

en: Thousands of small businesses went under during the recession.
zh: 在经济衰退期间，成千上万的小企业倒闭了。

en: The irreligious scoffed at the bishop's interpretation.

en: We agreed to the plan without qualification.

en: Hard as he was, his eyes filled with tears.

en: What is it like to be innocent?

en: Unable to prove his innocence, he was forced to leave his native town.
zh: 由于无法证明自己的清白，他被迫离开了家乡。

en: Do you believe his statement that he is innocent?

en: Nobody will believe his assertion that he is innocent.

en: I was relieved to hear that you had arrived safely.

en: There were few passengers who were safe.

en: I felt left out.

en: I was admitted to school without having to take an entrance examination.
zh: 我被学校录取了，不用参加入学考试。

en: An innocent man was arrested by mistake.

en: Of course, innocent people were released.

en: Who is silent is held to consent.

en: I like him all the more for his reticence.

en: No silence was ever written down.

en: The eerie silence struck terror into their hearts.

en: I have nothing to do with that.

en: Refuse to take no answer.

en: I'd like a full tank of regular unleaded.

en: Ten dollars of regular unleaded, please.
zh: 请加十美元的普通无铅汽油。

en: If you are idle, be not solitary, if you are solitary, be not idle.
zh: 如果你闲着，就不要独处；如果你独处，就不要闲着。

en: She was very glad to find the purse she had given up for lost.

en: Where is the missing dollar?

en: Nothing can come of nothing.

en: Nothing comes from nothing.

en: You can't spend what you don't have.
zh: 你不能花你没有的钱。

en: Get the dream.

en: I've steeled myself to face a certain amount of sacrifice, effort and hardship if that's what it takes to fulfill my dream.
zh: 我已经下定决心去面对一定程度的牺牲、努力和艰辛，如果这是实现我的梦想所需要的。

en: My dream came true.

en: Our dreams came true.

en: Dreams come true.

en: Little did I think that I would ever see her again.

en: I never dreamed I would meet you here.

en: It may not be a dream.

en: Dreams may be vivid and memorable.

en: I'm very pleased that your dream came true.
zh: 我很高兴你的梦想成真了。

en: His dream came true.
zh: 他的梦想成真了。

en: May all my dreams come true.

en: May all your dreams come true.
zh: 愿你所有的梦想都成真。

en: I was watching TV half sleeping.

en: He blamed me for neglecting my duty.

en: I can't fall asleep.

en: I can't sleep.

en: Take care lest you should fall asleep.

en: You should not sit up late just because it has charm.

en: As I was sleepy, I went to bed.

en: Sleepy as I was, I managed to finish my homework.

en: We yawn when sleepy or bored.

en: It is no use studying when you are sleepy.

zh: 我困了，所以我现在要走了。

en: Are you sleepy?

en: I'm sleepy.

en: Ethnic minorities struggle against prejudice, poverty, and oppression.

zh: 人们关注的焦点是个人和工业用途垃圾压实机市场的增长潜力与法律趋势的关系。

en: Democracy is one form of government.

en: Manga are to the Japanese film industry what bestsellers are to Hollywood.

en: Enough is as good as a feast.

en: You look contented.

en: You look content.
zh: 你看上去很满足。

en: I'm satisfied.

en: Happy is a man who is contented.

en: It was by no means unanimous but your proposal was selected.

en: I thought I was going to suffocate on the crowded train.

en: A contented mind is a perpetual feast.

en: Fill it up.

en: Fill it up, please.

en: I know it very well.

en: All is still.

en: Do you have a fountain pen with you?

en: I'll stand by you through thick and thin.

en: Manjiro played a part in making the two countries friends with each other.

en: Have everything ready.

en: All is well.

en: Everything is all right.

en: Everything is alright.

en: Everything's fine.

en: If we should miss the train, we'll go by bus.

zh: 如果我们错过了火车，我们就坐公共汽车去。

zh: 我和她一起走路。

en: I expected her to have come yesterday.
zh: 我本以为她昨天就该来了。

en: I took to her.
zh: 我喜欢上她了。

en: I can't make out what she said.
zh: 我听不清楚她说了什么。

en: I practiced my English on him.
zh: 我找他练习英语。

en: I stood for him.
zh: 我支持他。

en: I took no little pains to help him out of the difficulty.
zh: 我费了不少力气帮助他摆脱困境。

en: I asked him to reconcile them with each other.
zh: 我请他让他们和好。

en: I think him a fool.
zh: 我认为他是个傻瓜。

en: I cannot run faster than he.
zh: 我跑不过他。

en: I can't run as fast as he can.
zh: 我跑得没有他快。

en: I can't think of his name.
zh: 我想不起他的名字了。

en: I can't remember his name.
zh: 我记不起他的名字了。

en: I can't remember what his name is.
zh: 我不记得他叫什么名字了。

en: I can't trust in his word.
zh: 我不能相信他的话。

en: I am fed up with his vulgar jokes.
zh: 我厌倦了他的庸俗笑话。

en: I don't want to respect a man like him.
zh: 我不想尊敬像他这样的人。

en: I have five times as many stamps as he does.
zh: 我的邮票数量是他的五倍。

en: I have gotten him into trouble.
zh: 我让他惹上了麻烦。

en: I asked him point-blank.
zh: 我直接问了他。

en: I urged him to get away and cool down.
zh: 我劝他离开去冷静一下。

en: I am in no small degree indebted to him.
zh: 我在很大程度上要感谢他。

en: I gave him what little money I had with me.
zh: 我把他身上仅有的一点钱都给他了。

en: I shared a room with him.
zh: 我和他合住一个房间。

en: I am speculating that he may win the game.
zh: 我猜测他可能会赢得比赛。

en: I caught sight of him escaping from that shop.
zh: 我瞥见他从那家商店逃走了。

en: I wanted my hair cut short.
zh: 我想把头发剪短。

en: I want to ride a horse.
zh: 我想骑马。

en: I want to try riding a horse.
zh: 我想试试骑马。

en: I am round shouldered.
zh: 我是圆肩。

en: I feel for my father, who has to work on Sundays.
zh: 我同情我父亲，他星期天还得工作。

en: I sniffed the smell.
zh: 我闻了闻气味。

en: I feel good in a special way.
zh: 我感觉特别好。

en: I am in pursuit of points.
zh: 我正在追求积分。

en: I am looking forward to going to the zoo.
zh: 我期待着去动物园。

en: I don't go by what he says.
zh: 我不相信他说的。

en: I'll be off duty at noon on Saturday.
zh: 我星期六中午下班。

en: I was late as a result of the train delay.
zh: 由于火车晚点，我迟到了。

en: I grew up in the country.
zh: 我在乡下长大。

en: I aimed my gun at the target.
zh: 我用枪瞄准了目标。

en: I share an apartment with my brother.
zh: 我和我哥哥合住一套公寓。

en: I work best under pressure.
zh: 我在压力下工作效率最高。

en: I'm driving into town so I can drop you off on the way.
zh: 我要开车进城，所以可以顺路送你一程。

en: I'll get in.
zh: 我进去了。

en: I learned many of Takuboku's poems by heart.
zh: 我背诵了很多啄木的诗。

en: I get nervous when I speak before a large audience.
zh: 我在很多人面前讲话时会感到紧张。

en: I plan to take up engineering at college.
zh: 我计划在大学学习工程学。

en: I plan to major in engineering in college.
zh: 我计划在大学主修工程学。

en: I don't feel like eating at all.
zh: 我一点也不想吃东西。

en: I was dazzled by the headlights of an approaching car.
zh: 我被迎面驶来的汽车的前灯晃花了眼。

en: I can swim across the river.
zh: 我可以游过这条河。

en: I am able to swim across the river.
zh: 我能够游过这条河。

en: I bought this book the other day.
zh: 前几天我买了这本书。

en: I am afraid of what the teacher will say.
zh: 我害怕老师会说什么。

en: I can no more play the violin than a baby can.
zh: 我拉小提琴的水平和婴儿一样，根本不会。

en: I have a passion for stones.
zh: 我热爱石头。

en: I felt like I was dead.
zh: 我觉得自己好像死了。

en: I'm going to give up math.
zh: 我打算放弃数学了。

en: I realized that I couldn't beat him in math.
zh: 我意识到我在数学上赢不了他。

en: I belong to the swimming club.
zh: 我属于游泳俱乐部。

en: I'm not very good at swimming.
zh: 我不擅长游泳。

en: I'm bad at swimming.
zh: 我不擅长游泳。

en: I can't swim well.
zh: 我游泳游得不好。

en: I can't swim very well.
zh: 我游泳游得不太好。

en: I am not the captain of the new team.
zh: 我不是新队伍的队长。

en: I am slow to adapt myself to new circumstances.
zh: 我很难适应新的环境。

en: I felt my heart beating violently.
zh: 我感到我的心脏剧烈跳动。

en: I love her from the bottom of my heart.
zh: 我从心底里爱她。

en: I overslept and was late for school.
zh: 我睡过头了，上学迟到了。

en: I used to read detective stories before going to bed.
zh: 我过去常常在睡前读侦探小说。

en: I want to sleep.
zh: 我想睡觉。

en: I could hardly keep from laughing.
zh: 我差点没忍住笑出来。

en: As a boy, I used to lie on my back on the grass and look at white clouds.
zh: 小时候，我常常仰卧在草地上看白云。

en: As a boy I used to lie on my back and look at white clouds.
zh: 小时候我常常仰卧着看白云。

en: I caught sight of the boy escaping from the classroom.
zh: 我瞥见那个男孩从教室里逃了出来。
